channel.title: Hugo on Loving life and dreams.
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Loving life and dreams.

item.title: Blog Engine Migrates to Hugo Program
item.description: Recently found that their personal blog space suddenly ind accessible, after a check found that the original is the previous use of page service providers have stopped providing services. I had no choice but to relocate back to Github Pages. But that’s the development environment that’s been re-prepared for Hexo, and it’s going to take a hard time debugging to be successful. And just then on the Internet have seen Hugo static site engine article, a Go language-based development of the extremely fast framework, development environment deployment is also simple and fast. In addition, the original domain name is also about to expire, just together to organize the blog space.
